mapper.select: select id, realName, gender, age, indentifyNo, city, address, phone, regTime from stureginfo order by id asc limit #{start}, #{limit}
select id, realName, gender, age, indentifyNo, city, address, phone, regTime from stureginfo where realName=#{realName}
